summary: Witch Hunter's Quest, Armors and weapons.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][size=3]Witch Hunter's Quest.[/size]
[size=3]Add stylish weapons, armors and unique creatures.[/size][/font]

[font=Georgia]Current version is Pre-Alpha(for tester).
Debug Room  is Old Well of Blessed Ravine.
Console command "COC zzzLRHOldWell" (You can buy equipment / access test area)[/font]

[url=http://naaaaikikvicnvicn.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-130.html][font=Georgia]Development Page(Japanese)[/font][/url]

========================================================================================
[font=Georgia][size=4]Language[/size][/font]
========================================================================================
[font=Georgia][size=3]Japanese[/size]

[/font][font=Georgia][size=3][u]Translation[/u][/size][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86112/?][font=Georgia][size=3]English[/size][/font][/url]

[font=Georgia][size=3]Check version of Translation. Version mismatch between esp and bsa have risk of CTD.
Latest version is[/size][/font] [size=3][u]0.5.0.[/u][/size]

========================================================================================
[font=Georgia][size=4]Requirement[/size][/font]
========================================================================================
[list]
[*][size=3][font=Georgia]Skyrim [/font]1.9 [font=Georgia]or higher[/font][/size]
[*][size=3][font=Georgia][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url] [/font]1.7.3 [font=Georgia]or higher[/font][/size]
[*][size=3][font=Georgia][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14884/?]Fuz Ro D-oh - Silent Voice[/url] v[/font]6.0 [font=Georgia]or higher[/font][/size]
[*][font=Georgia][size=3]Dawnguard, Dragonborn[/size][/font]
[/list]
========================================================================================
[font=Georgia][size=4]Installation[/size][/font]
========================================================================================
[list=1]
[*][font=Georgia][size=2]Check Reuqirement[/size][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][size=2]Install Glenmoril.esp and Glenmoril.bsa.[/size][/font]
[/list]
========================================================================================
[font=Georgia][size=4]Quest[/size][/font]
========================================================================================
[size=3]Ep1: Little Red (Completed, 10 Quests)[/size]
You find an orphan at Frontgate of Falkreath. 
 
[size=3]Ep2: Glenmoril (Now developing, 1/7 Quests)[/size]
After Ep1, Ep2 start automatically.
V0.4.2 add 1 quest "The Blue Bird". 

[size=3]Ep3: Louse and Maggots (Not started)[/size]
[size=3]Ep4: Revenant(WIP)[/size]

========================================================================================
[font=Georgia][size=4]My Quest Mods[/size][/font]
========================================================================================
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67103/?][font=Georgia][size=3]VIGILANT[/size][/font][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80425?][font=Georgia][size=3]Unslaad[/size][/font][/url]

========================================================================================
[font=Georgia][size=4]Add-On[/size][/font]
========================================================================================
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86666/?][font=Georgia][size=3]Hunter's Essence[/size][/font][/url]
author: Vicn

files.name: GLENMORIL v0.4.2 prealpha
files.changelogHtml:
Added 7 weapons, 5 armors, 9 creature models and 2 areas.
Added First story of EP2 "The Blue Bird"
(You should use new save when applying update)

files.name: GLENMORIL v0.5.0
files.changelogHtml:
Added 40 weapons and 10 Outfits.
Added 8 small world for future missions.(Exterior only, interior is undone)
!!IMPORTANT!!---You shouldn't use save data of older version because Some NPC reference ID has been changed.
